title: Ticket Forward History
custom_preconds:
WIKI :https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3225634/03+Wallet+Tab#id-03WalletTab-1.1.5TicketList-ForwardviaLink

GIVEN user has previously forwarded and received tickets
AND user logs into BP app

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user navigates to Tickets tab
AND user taps on Ticket Forwards icon for the first time
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will enable the user to select team from team picker/dropdown
AND the app will block progress until a team is selected OR the user returns to the Wallet top level view

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects a team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the selected team is displayed with refreshed 'Send' and 'Receive' received lists

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects a team with Ticket Forwarding History
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display each row including the away team logo, away team name @ home team logo, home team name (for NGE, these logos and names are replaced entirely by the NGE description field)

iOS BUG: https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9328?focusedCommentId=2659756
Android BUG: https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6155
AND the app will display each row including number of tickets in the forward transaction
THEN the app will display each row displaying the date of the event

title: Ticket Forward Details Interface
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has previously forwarded and received tickets
AND user logs into BP app
AND user navigated to the Ticket Forward History Page (Tickets Tab > Ticket Forwards History Icon)

WIKI :https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3225634/03+Wallet+Tab#id-03WalletTab-1.1.7Ticketlist-Forwardsuccess

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on one of the tickets in the list
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will slide up a details view
THEN the app will display the details of each ticket involved in the forward including the section/seat/row
